actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of meat products processed abroad from cattle of United States origin.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to grant duty-free treatment of meat products and hides that are processed abroad from bovine of U.S. origin. Provides that a bovine is of U.S. origin if it was calved in the United States or was in the United States continuously during the 90-day period before the date of its exportation to a foreign country.

titles.title: A bill relating to the tariff treatment of meat products processed abroad from cattle of United States origin.
